author: Kaelan Deese
title: New York hospitalizations continue to decline as Cuomo calls for more testing
description: New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo (D) said during a press briefing on Saturday that COVID-19 hospitalizations are "starting to descend" while also calling for more testing throughout the state.
content: New York Gov. Andrew CuomoAndrew CuomoOvernight Health Care: White House says US has enough tests for phase one | Trump defends protesters challenging social distancing | Hospitals fear being shortchanged on virus fundingTrump defends demonstrators protesting… [+2201 chars]
